channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Taxpayer-Funded Libraries Promote These Graphic Books To Kids For Pride Month
item.description: While librarians and their supporters consistently decry critiques of their LGBT advocacy as censorship, less attention has been paid to the actual co...

item.title: One Step the U.S. Must Take to Restore the Navy
item.description: Shipyards exist to build ships, but without orders, nothing happens. It’s time for Congress to change that.

item.title: NC Elections Board Finally Approves Plan To Collect Missing Voter ID Data

item.title: Hegseth returns fire after being scolded for saying 'boys in the bombers'
item.description: Don't expect Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth to apologize for failing to use gender-inclusive language when congratulating "our boys on those bombers" ...

item.title: Japanese trade official says U.S. auto tariffs are 'not something we can accept'
item.description: Japan's leading trade negotiator said Thursday that President Trump's 25% tariff on foreign-made cars is unacceptable

item.title: SCOTUS Sides With South Carolina In Medicaid Fight Over Defunding Planned Parenthood
item.description: The 6-3 decision effectively paves the way for pro-life states to protect their taxpayers from bankrolling abortion facilities.

item.title: Trump Administration Deports Another Alien to El Salvador in Violation of Court Order
item.description: It appears that the administration should be able to deport Jordin Melgar-Salmeron, but it’s shooting itself in the foot.

item.title: The Cost of ‘Common Sense’
item.description: Regulation should rest on evidence, not intuition.

item.title: Trump calls for end to Netanyahu trial
item.description: President Trump called for the corruption trial against Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to be canceled or for him to be pardoned.

item.title: House GOP Subpoenas Top Biden Aide After He Refused To Testify About Joe’s Decline

item.title: Islamist Winning NYC Mayor Primary 25 Years After Sept. 11 Shows Even Legal Immigration Is A Huge Problem
item.description: For Democrats, the most American thing you can do is destroy America, and anything done to preserve tradition is un-American.

item.title: Supreme Court Nixes Suits Against States Defunding Planned Parenthood
item.description: Over-the-top rhetoric from Justice Jackson cannot overcome the Court’s precedents against individual lawsuits to enforce spending programs.
